article_title: Dr. Jeff Magee: 'Shift Happens' -- How To Make The 1 Degree Calibrations That Assure Your Success

article_metadata.description: Jeff Magee's “trajectory code” is a fairly straightforward template for identifying and enacting one degree course adjustments—continually—that adjust a work in progress by a single increment at a time.
article_metadata.author: Cheryl Conner
